rooms.description: A spacious, elegant entrance hall with a North-facing design, incorporating natural light and Vastu-compliant features.
A modern living room with floor-to-ceiling windows, accentuating the bohemian style and providing a panoramic view.
A cozy dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for intimate gatherings with a minimalist Bohemian touch.
A fully functional kitchen integrated into the living space, featuring modern appliances and open shelving for a boho vibe.
A central courtyard that serves as the heart of the penthouse, offering a blend of indoor-outdoor living and aligning with Vastu principles for prosperity.
A master bedroom designed as a cozy bachelor pad, featuring ample storage and modern decor with a Bohemian twist.
A dedicated study area that seamlessly integrates into the living space, ideal for productivity and relaxation.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows throughout the penthouse to maximize natural light and enhance the bohemian aesthetic.
A North-facing entrance door designed for optimal energy flow as per Vastu, ensuring a welcoming environment.
